title: Cloud - Provision New Azure VM
description: A client has requested a new virtual machine in their Microsoft Azure environment to host a new application.

tasks.description: Confirm the required specifications for the VM (CPU, RAM, storage) from the ticket.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician has the required specs for the new server.

tasks.description: Log in to the Azure portal and provision the new VM based on the specifications, placing it in the correct virtual network and resource group.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new VM is successfully created in the client's Azure tenant.

tasks.description: Document the new VM's details (IP address, credentials) in the client's documentation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new asset is documented correctly for future reference.
